title: "Process Data"
---

## 1. Load Packages

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(here)
library(tigris)
library(sf)
library(devtools)
```

```{r}
states <- readr::read_csv(file.path(here::here(), 'data/states.csv'))
```

```{r}
congressional_district_data <- map(states$State, congressional_districts)
names(congressional_district_data) <- states$State
saveRDS(congressional_district_data, file.path(here::here(), 'data/congressional_district_data.rds'))
```
